author: Warhammer
description:
Lex Imperialis, the second major expansion for Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, offers a new 15-hour storyline and introduces the Adeptus Arbites — a faction of incorruptible enforcers — alongside a new companion: the grim and relentless Solomorne Anthar. Featuring battle familiars like cybernetic eagles and cyber-mastiffs, this DLC is AVAILABLE NOW to all players.

title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Lex Imperialis Launch Trailer

author: Warhammer
description:
Watch along as Adam shows you how to paint your Grand Cathay Gate Masters of the Celestial Cities in no time at all, so you can get them on the city walls defending Grand Cathay against all of her enemies!

Here's a list of the paints and brushes used in this video:

Base:
Grey Seer
Leadbelcher
Mournfang Brown
Retributor Armour
Ratskin Flesh

Layer:
Cadian Fleshtone
Evil Sunz Scarlet
Fire Dragon Bright
Liberator Gold
Stormhost Silver
White Scar

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Contrast:
Apothecary White
Black Legion
Blood Angels Red
Fyreslayer Flesh
Gryph-Hound Orange

Brushes:
M Layer
S Layer
S Base

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

title: Grand Cathay Gate Masters of the Celestial Cities | Warhammer: The Old World
